title: Can We All Agree The Balance Team Doesn't Know What They're Doing
body:
They wanted to make the games seem like you have more of an impact. **Did they achieve this?**

They wanted games to have more comebacks. **Did they achieve this?**

They wanted to lower laning phase damage. **Did they achieve this?**

They wanted laning phase to last longer. **Did they achieve this?**

Look at this game currently, has anything changed for the better? In my personal experience, this game has gotten more snowbally and RNG than season 8. I didnt think it was possible, but Riot managed to do it. People now getting 12 damage level 1 with Conqueror, allowing them to 4 auto 100-0 you, *Coughs* Jax *Coughs*. Once one tower goes down, you skip right through mid game and are in late game now. Comebacks are achieved by killing people who are doing good, adding more to the RNG element of League. You have just as much impact as the support bursting enemies. Riot failed on all their objectives, are they even playing the game we are? Are they even testing these patches before releasing them? Seriously, what the fuck are you doing?

Ill ad my 2 cents in considering I was diamond 1 elo in season 7 but am now losing on smurf accounts to gold/plat elo players. Heres my thoughts.

>So on the one hand you guys cry that you can't carry games anymore and only the worst player in team decides the outcome of the game.

Which is true. One laner goes 1/9 top/mid/bot/jg, and they screw the game over. This isnt a "Oh the enemy is good at the game, its just unlucky." Its mostly the person who is dying a lot is potentially auto-filled, playing a champion they don't know, or just aren't good in general. In the seasons before season 8, dying 7+ times in laning phase (about the first 15 minutes), would usually mean that person was either facing a smurf, or intentionally feeding. This season, people are dying 7+ every game during laning phase, whether its on your team or the enemy team.

>But on the other hand SOMEHOW the enemy Laner CAN snowball and "win the entire game" aka "CARRY the game"??? ü§î

Yes... Imagine, your autofilled top laner is getting stomped because they can just die within seconds due to the insane damage. Now not only does the top laner get the gold from killing the autofilled top laner, but hes also getting about 1000+ gold from destroying the tower. Literally anyone will win lane against someone who doesnt know their champion, or lane theyre playing in. Most of the time the snowballing is based on luck, and jungler help as well. I cant tell you how many times ive played in Plat 3 elo and had some random Gold 4 player on our team that has a 49% overall wr, and yes, that gold 4 player ends up getting stomped by the plat 3 players.

>So what should Riot do in your opinion??
If they rewarding good players for good plays (so they can carry), everyone is screaming "OMG SO MUCH SNOWBALL"
>But if they dont, everyone screams "OMG YOU CANT CARRY GAMES ANYMORE!!"

They're not even making good plays tho, thats the thing. Players arent even going for cs anymore because kills are more worth while. The cs gold isnt even the thing that matters the most, its the Exp you get from the cs, which you dont need to last hit them to require the exp. Everyone is going to burst everyone no matter the gold lead, unless you are stacking health, then you wont get bursted so hard. 

If Riot wants to fix this game, they need to nerf overall starting damage level one, they need to make CSing a major part of ranking up again, get rid of bounties, and lessen the amount of gold received from tower plating. Farming cs used to be a major skill to require in this game, today I am seeing people in Plat 5 that have ranked up to Plat 2 by only getting 5-6 cs/m. Not only that, I watched a few plat players stream, and they will miss tons and tons of abilities, but yet theyre still ranking up. There is 0 reason a plat player should be getting less than 7 cs/m and still be ranking up, absolutely 0.

>I bet everything is ok if YOU are the one who is carrying am i right?

Actually carrying today isnt fun like it used to be. Because being the one carrying before season 8 was something you didnt see everyday. I remember thats what first inspired me to want to get better at League. We had a Nocturne Jungler in season 5 or 6 that was going ham all game, completely dominating the game (he was smurfing from plat elo we were in Silver 2). The enemy team was surprised at how good the Nocturne was at the game. Today, someone is carrying every single game. Its not fun, its nothing new, its not impressive, and all honesty its pretty boring when youre the carry. "Oh im carrying, I can now kill enemies in .46 seconds, how fun." Point is, everyone is a carry, seeing someone carry used to be impressive before season 8, carrying is boring today.

but I want to use my big brain and walk down top lane 1v5 as a tank while splitpushing and survive every hit long enough for the rest of my team to shove down mid and win the game (ofc getting several kills from people noticing at different times and meeting their push one at a time)

So at the end of the game I‚Äôll be 0/20 (all 20 deaths are from laning phase and I earned the comeback) but I did that cool 900 IQ Rick and morty big brain play so I can turn around and say ‚Äúlol my team sucks I carried this team stupid adc thinks that simply because he did more dmg and kills and gave less gold and got more towers he‚Äôs better but he doesn‚Äôt understand pressure like I do‚Äù

It's not that simple aka black & white.

Tower plating is good as an idea, gives way too much gold for nothing. You want to know what Riot should do? I'm gonna tell you:

- Revert Baron changes to old baron (no minion buff + harder to kill, like before)
- Remove Elemental Dragons and revert it to Old Dragon.  No need for such snowballing mechanics.
- Remove minion changes and make them like season 3, 4 + FIX MINION BLOCK THAT RETARDED RIOT BROKE IT AND LEFT IT IN BROKEN STATE.
- FIX BROKEN/OVERLOADED CHAMPS like Akali, Ire and so on.
- Fix tanks to actually tank and not to be able to kill hypercarry in one rotation of skills.
- Bring back Old Rune System (give everyone old runes for free) + Old Mastery, no keystone masteries.
- work on itemization. 
- Revert rework of champs that hardcore fans didnt and don't like.

Basically revert LoL back to before season 5 shitty Juggernaut Update, even better to Season 3 or 4.

And you will have again LoL that works// has strategy in how you play the map/less + no overbearing snowball (just enough for the winning team to still win if they play properly) etc.

The thing is Riot want to compete with shity mobile games and want fast games. 

The whole feel/pace of the game is changed, there's little strategy for the sake of constant fighting/overbearing snowball mechanics/overloaded champs with little-to-no counterplay and other 21312321 dumbs thing riot made throughout the years.

Actually, I am reinstating my League account, reinstating the game, and want to offer Riot and its entire balance team an apology.  I did not do sufficient research on Marc Merrill and Brandon Beck before posting what I posted before.

https://www.mcvuk.com/development/riot-founders-brandon-beck-and-marc-merrill-to-return-to-active-game-development

I did a good deal of research on Mr. Beck and the founders' personal ethics and now absolutely believe in their ability to continue to produce a compelling game.  I urge the community to believe in Riot's mission as well. 

Let's face it, people - some of our issues are because we play a lot, we don't always win, and then bad people who play the game say nasty things to us and then we don't have fun, and then it all seems black.

But that's because this is one of the most popular videogames on Earth.  

We've all had an unbelievable amount of fun playing it, or we wouldn't be here.

Kudos to Mr. Merrill and Mr. Beck and I will continue to be part of the League community.
